flawed_nl_solution:
He made $600 mowing yards, $250 for his birthday, $150 selling items and $150 doing odd jobs so he made 600+250+150+150 = $<<600+250+150+150=1145>>1145
He made $1145 and will save 40% so he saves 1145*0.4 = $<<1145*0.4=458>>458
#### 458

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1150, not 1145. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
